Text: The whole reason for the violence and its inevitability is the hardcore zionist leaders of the state of Israel. Zionism is an idealogy 'CREATED' by some facist Theodor Herzl in 1896! Traditional Jews do not support Zionism (the return to the land called "Israel" aka Eretz Yisrael) and the Zionist idealogy is totally contrary to traditional Jewish law and beliefs and the teachings of the Holy Torah. The whole idea of this idealogy is racist, chauvinist and not far off from white supremacist, except its jewish supremacist, and the government has created an insanely inhumane apartheid in that state. The zionists believe their "promised land" to this super "chosen people" who are above all other mankind, is there's btw this land stretches from Nile to the Euphrates ( Egypt to Iraq) and given the chances they will not stop at the ethnic cleansing of the Palestinian race ("monkey dressed up as people" and amongst many other racist statements indicating supremacist ideas). Thus I urge you to revise your comments and think straight sir! These people are not looking for a solution, for peace, Their solution is destroying their problem (i.e. The Original Palestinian Inhabitants ) .

May I also add, apparently Civilized are perhaps ppl who by over using the pretext of a genocide against their ppl, by a racist rule of Hitler, try to justify inhumane atrocities and genocide by their own people in an effort to ethnically cleanse a native population "very civilized ppl". May I also quote some of these civilized people sir?  Yizhak rabin "I would like Gaza to sink into the sea " !,  
There was no such thing as Palestinians, they never existed." Golda Maier Israeli Prime Minister ! We must do everything to ensure they (the Palestinian refugees) never do return" David Ben-Gurion ! "We must use terror, assassination, intimidation, land confiscation, and the cutting of all social services to rid the Galilee of its Arab population." Israel Koenig !! 

I do forgive your ignorance and misinformation however, and invite you to refrain from being so helplessly brainwashed by double standards created in your media, that make you think one terrorist is better than another. That Israel's fleet of thousands of high end artillery and Arsenal, fighter jets from the US, 6 Nuclear submarines from Germany and so on, plutonium bullets used against Palestinians,  on top of being in possession of admiettdly 330 nuclear war heads, and all their destruction of Palestinian lands, farms, houses, hospitals, and so on is noble , but the presence of Hezbolla in defense is not, since what they do in defense is "terrorism"  .   I hope you got the idea of the double standards you've been brought up with and that you now think more clearly. 

Also let me make this point clear: I do not have any sympathy or care for any terrorist groups killing innocent civilians, in any way and totally condemn them. I believe in nothing more than in Peace and love, however I have no respect for racist savagery against a helpless population.

OK,  no more time to waist on you, you are a long lost and deeply confused and brainwashed soul.
